flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: The female's hornndevelops slowly.nPrefers physicalfattacks such asnclawing andnbiting.
The female's hornndevelops slowly.nPrefers physicalfattacks such asnclawing andnbiting.
When resting deepnin its burrow, itsnthorns alwaysfretract.nThis is proof thatnit is relaxed.
When feeding itsnyoung, it firstnchews and tender­fizes the food,nthen spits it outnfor the offspring.
It has a calm andncaring nature.nBecause its hornfgrows slowly, itnprefers not tonfight.
It has a docilennature. If it isnthreatened withfattack, it raisesnthe barbs that arenall over its body.
When NIDORINA are with their friends ornfamily, they keep their barbs tuckednaway to prevent hurting each other.fThis POKéMON appears to becomennervous if separated from the others.
When NIDORINA are with their friends ornfamily, they keep their barbs tuckednaway to prevent hurting each other.fThis POKéMON appears to becomennervous if separated from the others.
When it is with its friends ornfamily, its barbs are tucked away tonprevent injury. It appears to becomennervous if separated from the others.
The female has a gentle temperament.nIt emits ultrasonic cries that have thenpower to befuddle foes.
The female’s horns develop slowly.nPrefers physical attacks such as clawingnand biting.
When it senses danger, it raisesnall the barbs on its body. Thesenbarbs grow slower than NIDORINO’s.
When it senses danger, it raisesnall the barbs on its body. Thesenbarbs grow slower than NIDORINO’s.
When it senses danger, it raisesnall the barbs on its body. Thesenbarbs grow slower than NIDORINO’s.
When feeding its young, it firstnchews the food into a paste, thennspits it out for the offspring.
It has a calm and caring nature.nBecause its horn grows slowly, itnprefers not to fight.
Ce Pokémon dresse ses piquantsnen cas de danger. Ils poussentnmoins vite que ceux de Nidorino.
When it senses danger, it raisesnall the barbs on its body. Thesenbarbs grow slower than Nidorino’s.
Ce Pokémon dresse ses piquantsnen cas de danger. Ils poussentnmoins vite que ceux de Nidorino.
When it senses danger, it raisesnall the barbs on its body. Thesenbarbs grow slower than Nidorino’s.
When it senses danger, it raisesnall the barbs on its body. Thesenbarbs grow slower than Nidorino’s.
When it senses danger, it raisesnall the barbs on its body. Thesenbarbs grow slower than Nidorino’s.
メスなので　せいかくは　おんこう。nくちから　だす　ちょうおんぱはnあいてを　まどわす　ちからがある。
암컷으로 성격은 온화하다.n입에서 내보내는 초음파는n상대를 혼란시키는 힘이 있다.
La femelle a un tempérament doux. Elle émet des crisnultrasoniques capables de déstabiliser ses ennemis.
Das Weibchen ist ausgeglichener. Es stößt Schreienim Ultraschallwellenbereich aus, die den Gegnernverwirren können.
Tiene un carácter afable. Emite ondas ultrasónicasnpara confundir al enemigo.
La femmina ha un temperamento mite. Lancianultrasuoni capaci di incantare i nemici.
The female has a gentle temperament.nIt emits ultrasonic cries that have the powernto befuddle foes.
メスなので　性格は　温厚。n口から　出す　超音波はn相手を　まどわす　力がある。
こどもに　エサを　わけあたえるときnおやが　かみくだき　やわらかくしたnエサを　はきもどして　あたえる。
새끼에게 먹이를 나눠줄 때n어미가 깨물어 부드럽게 한n먹이를 토해서 준다.
Pour nourrir ses petits, il mâche les aliments pour lesnrendre tendres et il les recrache à ses bébés.
Ehe es seine Jungen füttert, zerkaut es das Futternund gibt es ihnen anschließend.
Cuando alimenta a sus crías, primero mastica y ablandanla comida y luego la escupe para su prole.
Per nutrire i piccoli, prima intenerisce il cibonmasticandolo, poi lo sputa per i cuccioli.
When feeding its young, it first chews the food intona paste, then spits it out for the offspring.
子供に　エサを　分け与えるときn親が　かみくだき　やわらかくしたnエサを　吐き戻して　与える。
なかまや　かぞくと　いっしょの　ときは　おたがいnきずつかないように　トゲが　ひっこんでいる。nなかまから　はなれると　ふあんに　なるらしい。
동료나 가족과 함께일 때는 서로n상처 입히지 않도록 가시를 세우지 않는다.n동료와 떨어지면 불안해하는 것 같다.
Lorsqu’un Nidorina est avec ses amis ou sa famille, il replienses pointes pour ne pas blesser ses proches. Ce Pokémonndevient vite nerveux lorsqu’il est séparé de son groupe.
Wenn Nidorina mit seinen Freunden oder seiner Familienzusammen ist, zieht es seine Widerhaken ein, damit esnniemanden verletzt. Dieses Pokémon wird nervös,nwenn man es von seinen Artgenossen trennt.
Cuando están en familia o con sus amigos, esconden las púasnpara evitar accidentes. Según parece, se alteran bastante si senseparan del grupo.
Quando questi Pokémon si riuniscono con gli amici e lanfamiglia, tengono i loro aculei a debita distanza per evitarendi ferirsi a vicenda. Se allontanati dal branco, diventanonnervosi e irascibili.
When Nidorina are with their friends or family, they keep theirnbarbs tucked away to prevent hurting each other.nThis Pokémon appears to become nervous if separated fromnthe others.
仲間や　家族と　一緒の　ときは　お互いn傷つかないように　トゲが　引っ込んでいる。n仲間から　離れると　不安に　なるらしい。
なかまや　かぞくと　いっしょの　ときは　おたがいnきずつかないように　トゲが　ひっこんでいる。nなかまから　はなれると　ふあんに　なるらしい。
동료나 가족과 함께일 때는 서로n상처 입히지 않도록 가시를 세우지 않는다.n동료와 떨어지면 불안해하는 것 같다.
Lorsqu’un Nidorina est avec ses amis ou sa famille, il replienses pointes pour ne pas blesser ses proches. Ce Pokémonndevient vite nerveux lorsqu’il est séparé de son groupe.
Wenn Nidorina mit seinen Freunden oder seiner Familienzusammen ist, zieht es seine Widerhaken ein, damit esnniemanden verletzt. Dieses Pokémon wird nervös,nwenn man es von seinen Artgenossen trennt.
Cuando están en familia o con sus amigos, esconden las púasnpara evitar accidentes. Según parece, se alteran bastante si senseparan del grupo.
Quando questi Pokémon si riuniscono con gli amici e lanfamiglia, tengono i loro aculei a debita distanza per evitarendi ferirsi a vicenda. Se allontanati dal branco, diventanonnervosi e irascibili.
When Nidorina are with their friends or family, they keepntheir barbs tucked away to prevent hurting each other.nThis Pokémon appears to become nervous if separatednfrom the others.
仲間や　家族と　一緒の　ときは　お互いn傷つかないように　トゲが　引っ込んでいる。n仲間から　離れると　不安に　なるらしい。
すあなの　おくに　いるときはnかならず　トゲトゲが　ひっこむ。nリラックスしている　しょうこだ。
보금자리 안에 있을 때는n언제나 가시가 들어가 있다.n마음이 편안해졌다는 증거다.
待在巢穴深處的時候，n牠一定會把身上的刺收起來。n這代表牠正處於放鬆狀態。
Quand ce Pokémon s’abrite au fond de sonnterrier, ses cornes se rétractent. C’est signenqu’il est détendu.
Während es sich in seinem Bau aufhält, zieht esnseine Stacheln stets ein. Damit signalisiert es,ndass es entspannt ist.
Mientras se cobija en su madriguera, retrae lasnpúas, señal inequívoca de que se siente a salvo.
Quando è nella sua tana i suoi aculei si ritirano.nQuesto dimostra che è rilassato.
When resting deep in its burrow, its barbs alwaysnretract. This is proof that it is relaxed.
巣穴の　奥に　いるときはn必ず　トゲトゲが　引っこむ。nリラックスしている　証拠だ。
待在巢穴深处的时候，n它一定会把身上的刺收起来。n这表明它正处于放松状态。
